title: New: Solar Year – Night & Day
body: Having recently signed to the brand spanking new [No Fear Of Pop](nofearofpop.net) curated label Stratosfear, Montreal duo **Solar Year** have dropped the debut single from said label. _Night & Day_ is everything that’s so invigorating about electronic music at the moment; chopped vocals and twisted beats, all tied together into something that comes out as vaguely coherent. Check it out below, and order it [here](http://stratosfearic.net/). (Premiered via [The Fader](http://www.thefader.com/2012/12/06/stream-solar-year-night-day/))
